name: Garbage Pirates
description:
Made this for a hackathon. 

CONTROLS:

W-forward

A-portside

S-backward

D-starboard

Tab-switch perspective

To use the steering wheel controls, you need to have a steering wheel with green in the middle and on the top.

The code to run the steering wheel detection can be found here. To run it, clone the repository, and then type: python3 steering.py

You may have to pip instal python3, but if you do , a camera window will pop up and you can use the steering wheel to simulate WASD presses.

Experimental mode is an ocean that we tried to make from scratch. It is not a finished product, but it is kind of fun to mess around with.
